#id=1
#text=When I looked out of my window into my back garden I decided I needed a tree to help provide some shade for my dogs while they are outside as it can get very hot where I live .
#id=2
#text=I thought carefully about the type of tree I wanted to grow , I needed something with lots of leaves that would grow quite fast as I could n't afford to buy a tree that was already grown .
#id=3
#text=I did some research on the internet and decided that I would like a Japanese Maple tree with red leaves .
#id=4
#text=I drove to the garden center and made my way to the tree section , where there were lots of lovely small Japanese Maples for sale already growing in pots .
#id=5
#text=I found someone who worked there to advise me on the best way to plant the tree and how to care for it .
#id=6
#text=After I had paid for it and chosen some special compost for trees , they helped me load the car and I drove home to plant it .
#id=7
#text=I selected a good spot in the garden where it would have room to spread out and went into the garage to get my spade .
#id=8
#text=I dug a hole wide and deep enough for the entire pot to fit into , and I laid the pot on it 's side , gently tugging on the tree to remove it from the pot .
#id=9
#text=Once it was free , I shook the roots a little to free them up and planted the tree in the hole I had dug .
#text=Then I packed the sides of the roots with the compost , making sure the trunk stayed vertical as I was doing this .
#text=When I had finished I watered the new tree really well , making a puddle around the base of the trunk with my garden hose .
#text=Then it was time to sit back and imagine in a few years I would have a big leafy red maple providing lots of shade and color .
